title: 1.2 Master Challenge 3
question: Write a program to encrypt a given text using two distinct shift keys. In the original text, you will apply one shift key to the characters at even positions and the other to characters at odd positions.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
